name: Norman S. Matloff
content: Matloff, Norman S. – Computer Science Home Professor Norman S. Matloff Department of Computer Science 3053 Kemper Hall University of California Davis, CA 95616 Professor Matloff’s personal web page Professor Matloff’s Linux tutorial web page Email: matloff at cs.ucdavis.edu Phone: (530) 752-1953 Blogs: Mad (Data) Scientist—data science, R, statistics Upon Closer Inspection—tech industry practices, STEM education, university admissions, China, economics Research Professor Matloff’s research areas include parallel processing (especially software distributed shared memory), statistical computing and predictive analytics. Comments are closed. Professor Norman S. Matloff Computer Science University of California Davis, CA 95616 Email: matloff at cs.ucdavis.edu Phone: (530) 752-1953
